ActionCdncStpMonthlyMetric.name: ActionCdncStpMonthlyMetric
ActionCdncStpMonthlyMetric.description: Represents the monthly engagement metrics for an action cadence step.

ActionCadenceStepId.description: The ID of the related action cadence step.

AllCallsCallBackLater.description: The number of calls in the month for this step with the call result Call Back Later.

AllCallsLeftVoicemail.description: The number of calls in the month for this step with the call result Left Voicemail.

AllCallsMeaningfulConnect.description: The number of calls in the month for this step with the call result Meaningful Connect.

AllCallsNotInterested.description: The number of calls in the month for this step with the call result Not Interested.

AllCallsUncategorized.description: The number of calls in the month for this step with no call result specified.

AllCallsUnqualified.description: The number of calls in the month for this step with the call result Unqualified.

AllEmailsBouncedCount.description: The total of hard and soft bounced emails for this step in the month.

AllEmailsDeliveredCount.description: The number of successfully delivered emails for this step in the month.

AllEmailsHardBouncedCount.description: The number of hard bounced emails for this step in the month.

AllEmailsLinkClickedCount.description: The number of emails containing a link clicked by the recipient for this step in the month.

AllEmailsNotDeliveredCount.description: The number of sent emails that were bounced for all recipients on the email. Bounced emails aren’t marked as delivered. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

AllEmailsOpenedCount.description: The number of emails opened by the recipient for this step in the month.

AllEmailsOutOfOfficeCount.description: The number of emails that triggered an out-of-office reply for this step in the month.

AllEmailsRepliedCount.description: The number of emails replied to for this step in the month.

AllEmailsSentCount.description: The number of emails sent for this step in the month.

AllEmailsSoftBouncedCount.description: The number of emails soft bounced for this step in the month.

AllEmailsTrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent with engagement tracking enabled for this step in the month. Available in API version 51.0 and later.

AllEmailsUntrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent without engagement tracking for this step in the month. Available in API version 51.0 and later.

AllTotalCallsCount.description: The total number of calls with all call results for this step in the month.

DeliveredRecipientCount.description: The number of recipients that were successfully delivered an email. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

DeliveredRecipientRate.description: The percentage of unique recipients that received an email you sent. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

HardBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with hard bounce tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

HasTemplateAssigned.description: Indicates whether this step has an associated email template or call script. Available in API version 52.0 and later.

HrdBncTrackableRecipientSends.description: The number of recipients who received an email with hard bounce tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

IsCompoundMetric.description: When true, indicates that this metric represents engagement for a combination of the action cadence step and a single email template. The value is true for all action cadence steps created in Summer ’21 and later.

LinkClickTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with link click tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

LinkClkTrackableRecipientSends.description: The number of recipients who received an email with link tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

Month.description: The month in which the engagement occurred.

MonthInt.description: The month in which the engagement occurred, in yyyymm format.

OooTrackableRecipientSends.description: The number of recipients who received an email with out-of-office tracking. Out-of-office tracking requires Inbox. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

OpenTrackableRecipientSends.description: The number of recipients who received an email with open tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

OpenTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with open tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

OutOfOfficeTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with out-of-office tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

RecipientReplies.description: The number of unique recipients who replied to an email. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

RecipientSends.description: The number of unique email recipients. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

RecipientsHardBounced.description: The number of recipients that hard-bounced an email. Hard bounces can mean that the recipient's email address doesn't exist or is misspelled. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

RecipientsOutOfOffice.description: The number of recipients that responded with an out-of-office reply. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

RecipientsSoftBounced.description: The number of recipients that soft-bounced an email. A soft bounce often indicates a temporary issue with the recipient's email server, such as a full inbox. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

ReplyTrackableRecipientSends.description: The number of recipients who received an email with reply tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

ReplyTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with reply tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

SftBncTrackableRecipientSends.description: The number of recipients who received an email with soft bounce tracking. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

SoftBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent with soft bounce tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

SomeEmailsDeliveredCount.description: The number of sent emails that were successfully delivered to at least one of its recipients. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

SomeEmailsDeliveredRate.description: The percentage of sent and tracked emails that were successfully delivered to at least one of their recipients. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TemplateId.description: The ID of the email template or call script associated with this step. Available in API version 52.0 and later.

TrackableRecipientSendHrdBncRt.description: The percentage of emails sent to unique recipients with hard bounce tracking that hard bounced. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableRecipientSendOooRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with out-of-office tracking that received out-of-office replies from unique recipients. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableRecipientSendReplyRt.description: The percentage of emails sent with reply tracking that received replies from unique recipients. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableRecipientSendSftBncRt.description: The percentage of emails sent to unique recipients with soft bounce tracking that soft-bounced. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendHardBounceRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with hard bounce tracking that hard bounced. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendLinkClickRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with link tracking that had link clicks. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendOpenRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with open tracking that were opened by the recipient. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendOutOfOfficeRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with out-of-office tracking that received out-of-office replies. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendReplyRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with reply tracking that received replies. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendSoftBounceRate.description: The percentage of emails sent with soft bounce tracking that soft bounced. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

UniqueEmailsLinkClickedCount.description: The number of unique recipients who clicked a link in an email for this step in the month.

UniqueEmailsOpenedCount.description: The number of unique recipients who opened an email for this step in the month.

UniqueEmailsRepliedCount.description: The number of unique recipients who replied to an email for this step in the month.
